attributes.action: Liverpool Football Club Special League Title
attributes.additional_details: From an article by Adrian Durham in the Daily  ://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-2502451/Adrian-Durham-Liverpool-deserve-win-Premier-League-Hillsborough-disaster.html , he's suggested it would great if LFC were to win the PL in view of the suffering of the superb fans of this special club, my petition is for them to be awarded a special PL trophy at the end of the season in special recognition of this special club and it's extra special fans.
